label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_012
content:

### Events
- Replaced predicted-failure disk on stor-b-10; rebuild completed in 7.6 hours and unhealthy OSD count dropped to 3.
- Rebalance moved 354 TB-equivalent across jobs (logical moved 354? actual data moved TB recorded); improved skew index to 1.09.
- One snapshot verification failure tied to verifier filesystem filling; expanded verifier disk and re-verified successfully.
- Continued quota rate limits for top offenders; observed reduction in quota hard blocks from 4 to 3.

### On Call
- Shift: Beth N.
- Pages: 4
- Tickets: 9
- Status: Stable but tight; utilization >81% with ongoing quota management.
- Hardware Issue Resolved: Yes
- Monitoring Verifier Capacity: Yes
- Compaction Pending: Yes
